Hi to all the users!! 

 In order to make full use of the application do give the following points a read. 

 1) Ensure Net Connectivity to fetch Lyrics

 2) It is possible that no lyrics are displayed even if the device is connected to the internet, 
 in such a situation please refresh the lyrics again a couple of times or search for the song in the search section.

 3) The Saved Lyrics can be accessed from the drawer icon on the toolbar

 4) The saved lyrics can also be deleted by long pressing the song name


Enjoy Music!!
 And have a great time with music Lyrics.
